titleStmt.title: To His Grace, James Duke of Queensberry His Majesty's High Commissioner; and the Right Honourable, Right Worshipfull, and very Honoured, the Lords, Barons, and Burgesses, presently assembled in Parliament; Anna Fowler relict of Mr. William Arnot late Minister of the Gospel at Ebdie.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Anna, fl. 1700.

notesStmt.note: A petition concerning money which is owed to Anna Fowler on the death of her husband.
In ms. on verso: Anna Fowler for 2000 pounds wthout caution Novr. 1700.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
